Loading times feel even longer with more menu buttons, and soft resets often during use.

I had to rewrite my review to do this app justice. I've used 4 different digital bank apps over 4 years. Nubank has been the best. UI: Fantastic and easy to navigate. Issue Loans: Quick & convenient. Takes seconds to get a loan, low interest rate and highly customisable. Conta PJ: This is where the app shines. Almost zero bureaucracy. Took me seconds to open. All the competitors required loads of documents and clunky questionnaires. Looking forward to using your investment features.

Best bank esp for gringos. As a foreigner living in Brazil, it has been impossible to get a bank account with the exception of Nubank. Compared to my USA bank accounts, the experience is much simpler and pleasant to use.
